title: BRIEF-Viacom Will Bring Co's Brands To Mobile In FY18, CEO- MS Conference
text: February 28, 2018 / 6:40 PM / Updated 27 minutes ago BRIEF-Viacom Will Bring Co's Brands To Mobile In FY18, CEO- MS Conference Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 28 (Reuters) - Viacom Inc: * VIACOM INC-CEO ROBERT BAKISH BELIEVES WILL BRING CO‘S BRANDS TO MOBILE IN FY‘18-MORGAN STANLEY CONFERENCE * VIACOM INC-CEO ROBERT BAKISH SAYS NICKELODEON IS GOING TO HAVE ITS OWN KIDS AND FAMILY FEST THIS SUMMER -MORGAN STANLEY CONFERENCE * VIACOM INC- CEO-IN FY19, HALF OF PARAMOUNT SLATE WILL BE BRANDED FILMS, AND A NUMBER OF THOSE WILL BE NICKELODEON FILMS -MORGAN STANLEY CONFERENCE Further company coverage:
